mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_YEAR||'학년' AS STUDENT_YEAR ,COUNT(STUDENT_CODE) AS STUDENT_CNT FROM STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY STUDENT_YEAR

SELECT COUNT(STU.STUDENT_CODE) FROM STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SLI, LESSON_INFO LI, STUDENT STU WHERE SLI.LESSON_INFO_CODE = LI.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND STUDENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND STU.STUDENT_CODE = SLI.STUDENT_CODE AND SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND STUDENT_YEAR = 1 UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(STU.STUDENT_CODE) FROM STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SLI, LESSON_INFO LI, STUDENT STU WHERE SLI.LESSON_INFO_CODE = LI.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND STUDENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND STU.STUDENT_CODE = SLI.STUDENT_CODE AND SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND STUDENT_YEAR = 2 UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(STU.STUDENT_CODE) FROM STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SLI, LESSON_INFO LI, STUDENT STU WHERE SLI.LESSON_INFO_CODE = LI.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND STUDENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND STU.STUDENT_CODE = SLI.STUDENT_CODE AND SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND STUDENT_YEAR = 3

SELECT COUNT(STU.STUDENT_CODE) AS STUDENT_CNT , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'MM') AS MM FROM STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SLI, LESSON_INFO LI, STUDENT STU WHERE SLI.LESSON_INFO_CODE = LI.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND STU.STUDENT_CODE = SLI.STUDENT_CODE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'MM') ORDER BY MM
SELECT TEST_CODE , TO_CHAR(TEST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TEST_DATE , SUBJECT_CODE , (SELECT SUBJECT_NAME FROM SUBJECT WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = T.SUBJECT_CODE) AS SUBJECT_NAME FROM TEST T

SELECT SUBJECT_CODE , (SELECT SUBJECT_NAME FROM SUBJECT WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = T.SUBJECT_CODE) AS SUBJECT_NAME , STUDENT_YEAR , TO_CHAR(TEST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TEST_DATE , ROUND(AVG(SCORE),2) AS SCORE_AVG FROM TEST T, STUDENT S WHERE T.STUDENT_CODE = S.STUDENT_CODE GROUP BY SUBJECT_CODE, STUDENT_YEAR, TEST_DATE ORDER BY TEST_DATE

SELECT COUNT(STU.STUDENT_CODE) FROM STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SLI, LESSON_INFO LI, STUDENT STU WHERE SLI.LESSON_INFO_CODE = LI.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND STU.STUDENT_CODE = SLI.STUDENT_CODE AND TEACHER_CODE = #{teacherCode}
